attorneys: No attorney on appeal for appellant., Henry Wade, Dist. Atty., Charles S. Potts, Asst. Dist. Atty., Dallas, George P. Blackburn, State’s Atty., Austin, for the State.

opinions.opinion_text:
GRAVES, Presiding Judge.
The offense is robbery. The penalty assesed is confinement in the state penitentiary for a term of 15 years.
The evidence is sufficient to support the conviction. No complaints of the rulings of the court or other matters of procedure have been brought forward by bills of exception.
The judgment is affirmed.

court_short_name: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas
court_full_name: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas
